name: 6X6 Monster Truck Car Smashing
description: Do you have what it takes to boss all Monster trucking business? Climb in this huge monster to find out! You're steering the whole operation, from choosing the trucks to crushing the cars. Avoid falling off the cliff, pick the best-paying 6X6 Monster Truck , and you'll be hauling it in. 6X6 Monster Truck Car Smashing is an Action game with a wide range of terrains. Drive your way through the dynamic terrain that blocks your path to reach to crush as many cars possible.Ride to the top of this killer challenge, or take a face full of dirt. An extreme suspension means you can conquer more rotten obstacles than ever!
